caption: If you’re in the mood to, say, enjoy a rather *huge* portion of Middle Eastern style beef stroganoff prepared for you on the grill, and served up on a bed of yellow rice, on a chilly November day, and somewhat overcooked meat and certain (somewhat unusual) seasonings appeal to your taste buds, you’re in luck- provided they have the fixings and are in a sharing mood, of course. 😉 Nice folks!

(Translated by Google) the cashier. a fat man insult me ​​just because i look inside my bag. an old fat dispatcher insulted me just because I look inside my bag  (Original) the cashier.  a fat man insult me just because i look inside my bag . un despachador gordo viejo me insultó nomas porque mire dentro de mi bolsa

I like these guys. They always make funny comments about the crazy hipster beer flavors they sell, and I buy. And their wraps a decently flavored for a corner store. Overall, a decent spot, and cheaper than the mini mart. I wish they were open later than 11pm
Decent beer, high prices like all corner stores. They take credit card. The middle eastern food is amazing though!

Typical street corner 7/11 kinda thing. They also have a small kitchen area. Frozen pizza to arabic food. Never had the urge to try but it is there... I lived half a block from it so it was my choice for beer in the evening and then cold pop next morning. Friendly staff too.
